title: Saddle of lamb with herb crust and dauphinoise potato
description: This easy lamb recipe is served with a hearty potato bake, glazed fennel and sweet squashy cherry tomatoes.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
1kg/2lb 4oz waxy potatoes, such as Desiree, sliced thinly
about 900g/2lb boneless saddle of lamb, rolled and held with string (you can get your butcher to do this)
